content.raw:
Current solution: Ensure that all users of vrx-docker first follow the [VRX System Setup Tutorial](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall) sections **Install all prerequisites in your host system** and **Option 2: Build VRX from source**.  
Make sure it is sourced so that you can run launch files from `vrx_gazebo`. Make sure that your file structure is `/home/<username>/vrx_ws`, as this will assure reliable functionality.
content.html:
Current solution: Ensure that all users of vrx-docker first follow the VRX System Setup Tutorial sections Install all prerequisites in your host system and Option 2: Build VRX from source.
Make sure it is sourced so that you can run launch files from vrx_gazebo. Make sure that your file structure is /home/<username>/vrx_ws, as this will assure reliable functionality.
